text: Ranasinghe Hettiarachchige Tudor Edward Ranasinghe Gunasekara Sri Lanka Parliament Directory of Past Members (23 January 1935 - 29 August 2021), known as Tudor Gunasekara (Sinhala: ටියුඩර් ගුණසේකර), was a Sri Lankan politician. He was born in Colombo, Sri Lanka. He was a member of the United National Party. Gunasekara was a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka from 1977 until 1983. Gunasekara died on 29 August 2021 in Colombo from COVID-19, aged 86.Former Minister Tudor succumbs to Covid-19. Sri Lanka Mirror (Sri Lanka), Retrieved 30 August 2021. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Sri Lanka Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:People from Colombo
title: Tudor Gunasekara
